author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
✨ The free demo is live now on Steam: http://kgs.link/starbirds ✨
Play today and help us shape the game before Early Access! 

Star Birds is a cheerful, cozy resource management game set in space. You help a brave flock of intergalactic birds mine asteroids, build thriving production networks, and discover new technologies to advance across the galaxy.
We’ve been working on this for almost two years now with the amazing team at Toukana Interactive, the minds behind Dorfromantik, and can’t wait to hear what you think about the demo!

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #StarBirds #toukanainteractive #spaceexploration #indiegame #indiegames 

Follow us for more sciencey content! 🦆

title: Test Our PC Game – Star Birds Demo Out Now!
